about.name: Minjoon Eom
about.bio: I'm Minjoon Eom, a Computer Science student at the University of Washington (Class of 2027) passionate about full-stack development, AI, and building systems that better the world.
about.education: UW Computer Science B.S. (3.7 GPA, Seattle WA)
about.interests: Full Stack Development, Machine Learning, Human-Computer Interaction, Basketball
about.skills: Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, React, Next.js, Docker, AWS

coreThemes.title: Besides Coding
coreThemes.description1: I try to play basketball at least 4 times a week, and whenever I'm not playing, I'm watching basketball games or reading about the latest news in the space.
coreThemes.description2: I work at Din Tai Fung as a greeter and my favorite food there is the spicy wontons.
coreThemes.description3: I am a member of the Lambda Phi Epsilon fraternity where I served as the rush chair.
coreThemes.description4: I love being outside, and one of the main things I do is going on hikes, especially since I live in Washington State
